title: Is yeast in large or small amounts halal to consume? #Assim #assimalhakeem #assim assim al hakeem
transcript: um I asked this question before and you answered with a link from Islam KU but I didn't really understand so my question is is yeast in Foods whether there is a large amount or a little amount of yeast in the food permissible to eat the link from Islam Q&A clearly stated the fatwa of which I don't understand how you you cannot understand it Yates is not alcohol it is put and used with dough with bakeries with food and no matter how much you use it will never ever intoxicate you and said even if you consume Yates raw if anyone would do that that would not intoxicate you so it's totally halal
